snippet.title: Mythic Realms - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Mythic Realms is available now on the Meta Quest 3, 3S, Pro & 2 here: https://www.meta.com/experiences/mythic-realms/8364993590228690/

In Mythic Realms, you’ll step into the boots of a hero like never before, as you physically play out an RPG adventure, journeying into new encounters, battling mighty foes, gathering resources, and improving your character with each play session. Each expedition is unique, allowing players to choose how they engage with the adventure around them. It’ll take every bit of savvy, skill and energy to uncover the mystery between the collision of two worlds and help the kingdom flourish to its full potential.

Join The Discord: https://discord.gg/Cewyt7yrtY

Store Page: https://www.meta.com/experiences/mythic-realms/8364993590228690/

Linktree: https://linktr.ee/petricoregames

Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/PetricoreGames

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@mythic.realms.game

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/petricoregames/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/petricore-inc/

Website: https://petricoregames.com/
